verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> happened יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> And it came to pass [after] many וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> that the word יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָיָה֙ <WH1961> came אֶל־ <WH413> to אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <WH452> came to Elijah בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <WH8141> year הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֖ית <WH7992> in the third לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לֵ֚ךְ <WH1980> Go הֵרָאֵ֣ה <WH7200> shew אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחְאָ֔ב <WH256> thyself unto Ahab וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> and I will send מָטָ֖ר <WH4306> rain עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> the earth

וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH1980> went אֵֽלִיָּ֔הוּ <WH452> And Elijah לְהֵרָא֖וֹת <WH7200> to shew אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> himself unto Ahab וְהָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> famine חָזָ֥ק <WH2389> And [there was] a sore בְּשֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> in Samaria

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called אַחְאָ֔ב <WH256> And Ahab אֶל־ <WH413> about עֹבַדְיָ֖הוּ <WH5662> Obadiah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> over הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> which [was] the governor of [his] house וְעֹבַדְיָ֗הוּ <WH5662> (Now Obadiah הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become יָרֵ֛א <WH3373> feared אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> greatly

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become בְּהַכְרִ֣ית <WH3772> cut off אִיזֶ֔בֶל <WH348> For it was [so] when Jezebel אֵ֖ת <WH853> נְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> the prophets יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took עֹבַדְיָ֜הוּ <WH5662> that Obadiah מֵאָ֣ה <WH3967> an hundred נְבִאִ֗ים <WH5030> prophets וַֽיַּחְבִּיאֵ֞ם <WH2244> and hid חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifties אִישׁ֙ <WH376> a בַּמְּעָרָ֔ה <WH4631> in a cave וְכִלְכְּלָ֖ם <WH3557> and fed לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> them with bread וָמָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> waste

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אַחְאָב֙ <WH256> And Ahab אֶל־ <WH413> to עֹ֣בַדְיָ֔הוּ <WH5662> unto Obadiah לֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> Go בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> into the land אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַעְיְנֵ֣י <WH4599> unto all fountains הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> of water וְאֶ֖ל <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַנְּחָלִ֑ים <WH5158> and unto all brooks אוּלַ֣י ׀ <WH194> peradventure נִמְצָ֣א <WH4672> we may find חָצִ֗יר <WH2682> grass וּנְחַיֶּה֙ <WH2421> to save ס֣וּס <WH5483> the horses וָפֶ֔רֶד <WH6505> and mules וְל֥וֹא <WH3808> have to נַכְרִ֖ית <WH3772> that we lose מֵהַבְּהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> not all the beasts

וַֽיְחַלְּק֥וּ <WH2505> So they divided לָהֶ֛ם <WH1992> like אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land לַֽעֲבָר־ <WH5674> between them to pass throughout בָּ֑הּ אַחְאָ֞ב <WH256> it Ahab הָלַ֨ךְ <WH1980> went בְּדֶ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> way אֶחָד֙ <WH259> one לְבַדּ֔וֹ <WH905> himself וְעֹֽבַדְיָ֛הוּ <WH5662> by himself and Obadiah הָלַ֥ךְ <WH1980> went בְּדֶרֶךְ־ <WH1870> way אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> another לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <WH905> himself

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become עֹבַדְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH5662> And as Obadiah בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> was in the way וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold אֵלִיָּ֖הוּ <WH452> behold Elijah לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <WH7125> met וַיַּכִּרֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH5234> him and he knew וַיִּפֹּ֣ל <WH5307> him and fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> on his face וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said הַאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you זֶ֖ה <WH2088> is this אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> [Art] thou that my lord אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH452> Elijah
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he answered ל֖וֹ אָ֑נִי <WH589> is לֵ֛ךְ <WH1980> Go אֱמֹ֥ר <WH559> tell לַאדֹנֶ֖יךָ <WH113> thy lord הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH452> Behold Elijah

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said מֶ֣ה <WH4100> What חָטָ֑אתִי <WH2398> What have I sinned כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֞ה <WH859> you נֹתֵ֧ן <WH5414> that thou wouldest deliver אֶֽת־ <WH853> עַבְדְּךָ֛ <WH5650> thy servant בְּיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand אַחְאָ֖ב <WH256> of Ahab לַהֲמִיתֵֽנִי׃ <WH4191> to slay

חַ֣י ׀ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God אִם־ <WH518> is no יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> there is no גּ֤וֹי <WH1471> nation וּמַמְלָכָה֙ <WH4467> or kingdom אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> whither לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not שָׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> hath not sent אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> my lord שָׁם֙ <WH8033> in it לְבַקֶּשְׁךָ֔ <WH1245> to seek וְאָמְר֖וּ <WH559> thee and when they said אָ֑יִן <WH369> else וְהִשְׁבִּ֤יעַ <WH7650> [He is] not [there] he took an oath אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּמְלָכָה֙ <WH4467> of the kingdom וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַגּ֔וֹי <WH1471> and nation כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִמְצָאֶֽכָּה׃ <WH4672> that they found

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> and now אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you אֹמֵ֑ר <WH559> And now thou sayest לֵ֛ךְ <WH1980> Go אֱמֹ֥ר <WH559> tell לַאדֹנֶ֖יךָ <WH113> thy lord הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH452> Behold Elijah

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> will come אֲנִ֣י ׀ <WH589> I אֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> along מֵאִתָּ֗ךְ <WH853> וְר֨וּחַ <WH7307> from thee that the Spirit יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD יִֽשָּׂאֲךָ֙ <WH5375> shall carry עַ֚ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot אֵדָ֔ע <WH3045> thee whither I know וּבָ֨אתִי <WH935> not and [so] when I come לְהַגִּ֧יד <WH5046> and tell לְאַחְאָ֛ב <WH256> Ahab וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot יִֽמְצָאֲךָ֖ <WH4672> and he cannot find וַהֲרָגָ֑נִי <WH2026> thee he shall slay וְעַבְדְּךָ֛ <WH5650> me but I thy servant יָרֵ֥א <WH3372> fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD מִנְּעֻרָֽי׃ <WH5271> from my youth

הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הֻגַּ֤ד <WH5046> Was it not told לַֽאדֹנִי֙ <WH113> my lord אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> what I did בַּהֲרֹ֣ג <WH2026> slew אִיזֶ֔בֶל <WH348> when Jezebel אֵ֖ת <WH853> נְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> the prophets יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וָאַחְבִּא֩ <WH2244> how I hid מִנְּבִיאֵ֨י <WH5030> prophets יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S מֵ֣אָה <WH3967> an hundred אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> men חֲמִשִּׁ֨ים <WH2572> by fifty חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifties אִישׁ֙ <WH376> a בַּמְּעָרָ֔ה <WH4631> in a cave וָאֲכַלְכְּלֵ֖ם <WH3557> and fed לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> them with bread וָמָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> waste

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> and now אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you אֹמֵ֔ר <WH559> And now thou sayest לֵ֛ךְ <WH1980> Go אֱמֹ֥ר <WH559> tell לַֽאדֹנֶ֖יךָ <WH113> thy lord הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <WH452> Behold Elijah וַהֲרָגָֽנִי׃ <WH2026> [is here] and he shall slay ס

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said אֵֽלִיָּ֔הוּ <WH452> And Elijah חַ֚י <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom עָמַ֖דְתִּי <WH5975> whom I stand לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> before כִּ֥י <WH3588> will surely הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> myself unto him to day אֵרָאֶ֥ה <WH7200> I will surely shew אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> about

וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <WH1980> went עֹבַדְיָ֛הוּ <WH5662> So Obadiah לִקְרַ֥את <WH7125> to meet אַחְאָ֖ב <WH256> Ahab וַיַּגֶּד־ <WH5046> and told ל֑וֹ וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went אַחְאָ֖ב <WH256> him and Ahab לִקְרַ֥את <WH7125> to meet אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH452> Elijah

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he answered לֹ֤א <WH3808> have not עָכַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH5916> I have not troubled אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you וּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> but thou and thy father's בַּֽעֲזָבְכֶם֙ <WH5800> in that ye have forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹ֣ת <WH4687> the commandments יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> along אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after that הַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <WH1168> Baalim

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent אַחְאָ֖ב <WH256> So Ahab בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּקְבֹּ֥ץ <WH6908> together אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <WH5030> the prophets אֶל־ <WH413> at הַ֥ר <WH2022> unto mount הַכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <WH3760> Carmel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH452> Elijah אֶל־ <WH413> unto הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> unto the people אֲנִ֞י <WH589> I נוֹתַ֧רְתִּי <WH3498> I [even] I only remain נָבִ֛יא <WH5030> a prophet לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְבַדִּ֑י <WH905> alone וּנְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> prophets הַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> but Baal's אַרְבַּע־ <WH702> [are] four מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> and fifty אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וְיִתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> Let them therefore give לָ֜נוּ שְׁנַ֣יִם <WH8147> us two פָּרִ֗ים <WH6499> bullocks וְיִבְחֲר֣וּ <WH977> and let them choose לָהֶם֩ <WH1992> like הַפָּ֨ר <WH6499> bullock הָאֶחָ֜ד <WH259> one וִֽינַתְּחֻ֗הוּ <WH5408> for themselves and cut it in pieces וְיָשִׂ֙ימוּ֙ <WH7760> and lay עַל־ <WH5921> on הָ֣עֵצִ֔ים <WH6086> [it] on wood וְאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> no fire לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יָשִׂ֑ימוּ <WH7760> and put וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> I אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה ׀ <WH6213> [under] and I will dress אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֣ר <WH6499> bullock הָאֶחָ֗ד <WH259> the other וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <WH5414> and lay עַל־ <WH5921> on הָ֣עֵצִ֔ים <WH6086> [it] on wood וְאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> no fire לֹ֥א <WH3808> no אָשִֽׂים׃ <WH7760> and put
